issue.title: Controlling Pan Tilt Gimbal using JointControlPlugin and JointStatePublisher

content.raw:
We’re also stuck on creating a bridge for the Joint State Publisher. We’re getting the following error when we try to launch. I’m guessing I’m using the wrong ignition type.

\[ERROR\] \[1585071570.190259796\]: Failed to create a bridge for topic \[/world/simple\_tunnel\_02/model/A1/joint\_state\] with ROS type \[sensor\_msgs/JointState\] and Ignition Transport type \[ignition.msgs.Joint\]

The following is our code for the joint state publisher in vehicle\_topics.launch. The /world/simple\_tunnel\_02/model/A1/joint\_state topic publishes fine when we echo it. 

```
    <!-- Joint State Publisher -->
    <node
      pkg="ros_ign_bridge"
      type="parameter_bridge"
      name="ros_ign_bridge_joint_state_publisher"
      args="$(arg joint_state_prefix)/joint_state@sensor_msgs/JointState[ignition.msgs.Joint">
      <!-- <remap from="/model/$(arg name)/joint" to="joint"/> -->
    </node>
```

‌

‌
content.html:
We’re also stuck on creating a bridge for the Joint State Publisher. We’re getting the following error when we try to launch. I’m guessing I’m using the wrong ignition type.

[ERROR] [1585071570.190259796]: Failed to create a bridge for topic [/world/simple_tunnel_02/model/A1/joint_state] with ROS type [sensor_msgs/JointState] and Ignition Transport type [ignition.msgs.Joint]

The following is our code for the joint state publisher in vehicle_topics.launch. The /world/simple_tunnel_02/model/A1/joint_state topic publishes fine when we echo it. 

    <!-- Joint State Publisher -->
    <node
      pkg="ros_ign_bridge"
      type="parameter_bridge"
      name="ros_ign_bridge_joint_state_publisher"
      args="$(arg joint_state_prefix)/joint_state@sensor_msgs/JointState[ignition.msgs.Joint">
      <!-- <remap from="/model/$(arg name)/joint" to="joint"/> -->
    </node>

‌
